duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce or manage projects and programs that apply analysis to inform and resolve complex business problems.
Support the Store Channel in creation and alignment of Store Co-op Membership plans and forecasts for enterprise planning.
Expose areas of opportunity by reviewing performance against trend and target, conduct site level analysis to support store strategy development.
Provide actionable recommendations to identify, drive and influence key business strategies and plans affecting new and existing retail operations programs.
Contribute to the ongoing stream of analysis and hypothesis-based ideas for testing.
Advocate for user adoption of analytics and data-driven testing both within and outside of Retail Operations.
Mentor less experienced members of the team.
Achieve objectives according to pre-defined goals for long-range, complex projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or related equivalent experience plus 5-7 years’ experience
